title: Can we answer replies from the "My Updates" Section?
body: That would be way easier and quicker than going to every single thread to answer one question or reply.

replies.body: Would be awesome, I agree. However, the Boards Dev team is currently actively working on the new League Client and *most likely* won't be putting out new Boards features for a little while.  Keep the suggestions flowing, though! We love hearing ways to make posting/reading/replying better :)
Lol really? It's kinda weird to have one team for the Boards and the Client lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=bzRrPGQO,discussion-id=2qUFp00F,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-01-19T21:20:00.036+0000)
>
> Lol really? It's kinda weird to have one team for the Boards and the Client lol.

No, you misunderstand. There are a lot of people working on the new client. Given the Boards is a lot of visual work and front-end stuff, we naturally can segue into working on the new client. 

That doesn't mean we don't work on bugfixes or major issues. We just aren't actively developing the Boards (i.e., new features) right now.

Huh. That actually makes sense.

Couldn't you guys have said that back during the [Boards reorganization changes](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/4c93Yn2X-boards-org-changes-new-sub-boards-live)? Admittedly, mentioning the new client about a week before the official announcement probably wouldn't have gone well. However, that explanation would have made the "Boards team can't schedule dev time to work on the Boards" statement much more understandable.

> [{quoted}](name=Minarde,realm=NA,application-id=bzRrPGQO,discussion-id=2qUFp00F,comment-id=0000000100000001,timestamp=2016-01-20T03:05:39.334+0000)
>
> Huh. That actually makes sense.
> 
> Couldn't you guys have said that back during the [Boards reorganization changes](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/4c93Yn2X-boards-org-changes-new-sub-boards-live)? Admittedly, mentioning the new client about a week before the official announcement probably wouldn't have gone well. However, that explanation would have made the "Boards team can't schedule dev time to work on the Boards" statement much more understandable.

That's different from what we do. Our team *builds* the Boards, we don't *manage* them.  We do things like build the responsive mobile experience and fix software bugs.  It's two totally diff things. One is engineer-centric, the other is community-centric.

My team had 0 to do with the reorg... that's Adillonmostdirty and Keyru and co's team :)

Maybe to make it clearer for the non techies: It's like the difference between building a house and furnishing the rooms. 

Right now they can't add a garage, but they can change the guest room into a baby room for example.

> [{quoted}](name=Duke Anax,realm=EUW,application-id=bzRrPGQO,discussion-id=2qUFp00F,comment-id=000000010000000100000000,timestamp=2016-01-20T19:20:12.856+0000)
>
> Maybe to make it clearer for the non techies: It's like the difference between building a house and furnishing the rooms. 
> 
> Right now they can't add a garage, but they can change the guest room into a baby room for example.

Fabulous. Stolen for repasta.
Bacon + Pasta = Heaven?

Yay!

glad to be of assistance.

> [{quoted}](name=Duke Anax,realm=EUW,application-id=bzRrPGQO,discussion-id=2qUFp00F,comment-id=000000010000000100000000,timestamp=2016-01-20T19:20:12.856+0000)
>
> Right now they can't add a garage, but they can change the guest room into a **baby room** for example.

So..like...a special board all the people that are like WHY WAS I BANNED I DID NOTHING WRONG + 'Nerf X champ, no counterplay.'
?
With soft edges and those outlet covers.
...like a Meddler Bot that automatically posts in your thread saying everything will be all better and we have plans to nerf x champ soon(tm)
..and a LyteSmite Bot that automatically posts chat logs.

#Petition to add "The Baby Room" as a thread type.
..and hard code it redirect all qq posts to it...

Sorry for intrusion here, but... rioter rundown in mobile mode? pwetty pwease?

http://i.imgur.com/YpXDGq9.gif

> [{quoted}](name=patmax17,realm=EUW,application-id=bzRrPGQO,discussion-id=2qUFp00F,comment-id=000000010000000100000002,timestamp=2016-01-21T07:10:34.504+0000)
>
> Sorry for intrusion here, but... rioter rundown in mobile mode? pwetty pwease?
> 
> http://i.imgur.com/YpXDGq9.gif

you missed the whole convo we just had here  {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} 

sadly we aren't actively developing new features for the Boards. Instead, we are working on the new client :) more devs = get sh*t done faster. <3
If you aren't working on the boards, why are you still a 'boards dev analyst'?

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

I got this part of your post wrong:

> We do things like build the responsive mobile experience and fix software bugs.

I thought you meant you were... ok, ok, I'm just stupid, sorry >.<

Now I'm confused again. I figured developing the tools to tag, filter, and move topics, which was what Adillonmostdirty said needed dev time, would fall under engineer work. I wasn't attributing the reorg to the Boards Dev team; that's just when "lacking dev time/resources" was mentioned.

I see. I'd still rather there were dedicated teams so we can develop the two at the same time. :P

How's the client coming along btw?

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=bzRrPGQO,discussion-id=2qUFp00F,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2016-01-20T00:54:11.217+0000)
>
> I see. I'd still rather there were dedicated teams so we can develop the two at the same time. :P
> 
> How's the client coming along btw?

Well, it's a little more difficult than that.  The Boards are in a good place right now compared to the new client, which doesn't even exist in public form yet.  soooooo we are working on getting the new thing out!

hope this makes sense.
It does. Still rather the dedicated teams. Develop everything simultaneously. That'd be Legendary. Lol. Looking forward to the new Client and the rest of Season 6 updates. :D

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=bzRrPGQO,discussion-id=2qUFp00F,comment-id=000000010000000000010000,timestamp=2016-01-21T00:39:35.685+0000)
>
> It does. Still rather the dedicated teams. Develop everything simultaneously. That'd be Legendary. Lol. Looking forward to the new Client and the rest of Season 6 updates. :D

Lol we have so many dedicated teams to multiple things... it's pretty common for teams to "borrow" people to get their sh*t done :D

That's cool. Multitasking ftw! Now that just means we need more Rioters so we can multitask at everything. :P

Be Legendary! :D

Btw, You're really making me crave for bacon lol.

More money with two teams though :P In a perfect world, I think we could all agree (Rioter and players alike) that everyone wants a bunch of people working on each things all at the same time. But unfortunately can't do that :( Of course, if it was something really urgent, I would think they would put people on it.
I wonder about a "Perfect World."

why is the boards dev team working on the new league client?

._.
